document_data.name: Lady Calantar

document_data.mainbody:
{{quote|Discussion? Do you really expect us to pretend we are agreeing to this willingly?|Lady Calantar's last words before her execution was ordered. {{yearlinkName|1371}}}}


'''Lady Calantar''' was a noblewoman and matriarch of the [[Calantar]] family in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
As their matriarch,

The meeting would later be known as the [[Council of Iron]].
